translation.Message_0_Page_0: We've managed to get out with quite a bit of ordinance, but we gotta save them for when they're necessary.  That being said, we need strike modules as well in order to allow targeting devices to direct ordinance.  If we're to restart society in any way, we'll need an economy - thus, it's necessary to pay for these.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Our teams are spread out, so whoever's closest will provide support, so it'll probably be from a random direction, so keep that in mind when you call them in.
